title: Twitpic se tribuye el mérito de tu conteido

extracted: To publish another Twitpic user’s content for any commercial purpose or for distribution beyond the acceptable Twitter "retweet" which links back to the original user’s content page on Twitpic, whether online, in print publication, television, or any other format, you are required to obtain permission from Twitpic in advance of said usage and attribute credit to Twitpic as the source where you have obtained the content.

tosdr.case: Ellos se atribuyen el mérito de tu conteido
tosdr.tldr: Twitpic tiene acuerdos con socios para usar tu contenido sin darle mérito. Los socios de Twitpic “estan obligados a […] atribuir el merito a Twitpic como la fuente”.
